column5: Stay in luxury at a affordable price. This awesome apt can now include a Pro Spinning Stripper Pole (it's removable) pool, gym, game room, business room, balcony, king size memory foam bed, couch pullout to a queen size bed, 1 block off I 75 freeway & surrounded by restaurants. PERFECT APARTMENT!
column8: Luxury at its BEST! 2 Beds+POOL+ extras
